name: HT Electrolyte Water
description: Healthirst electrolyte water is the first water to combine a proven formula of electrolytes and pure water, without the calories, sugars, and preservatives typically found in most sport drink. Each bottle includes our patented HT Tech Cap which contains the electrolyte formula. Just twist the cap to unlock hydration. There are 12 16oZ. bottles per case. Price includes standard flat rate shipping.
